mapper.select: select sum(o.settle_amt) all_settle, sum(CASE WHEN o.fee_type=6 THEN od.sub_total ELSE 0 END ) sale_price, sum(CASE WHEN o.fee_type=6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) sale_count, sum(CASE WHEN o.status=1 THEN o.settle_amt ELSE 0 END ) wait_settle, sum(CASE WHEN o.status=2 THEN o.settle_amt ELSE 0 END) has_settle from tb_order_settle o left join tb_order od on od.order_id=o.order_id where o.`status` in (1,2) and o.fee_type in (1,6) and o.settle_user=#{consumer_id} and od.`status` not in (7)

select os.id,os.status from tb_order_settle os left join tb_order o on os.order_id=o.order_id where o.`status`=6 and os.fee_type=#{fee_type} and date_format(os.add_date,'%Y%m')=#{settle_month} and os.settle_user=#{settle_user}

select od.order_id,od.total order_amt,od.`status` as order_status,o6.`status` settle_status,date_format(od.pay_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as pay_date,date_format(od.sign_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as sign_date ,oi.num,s.consumer_id,d.key_value order_status_text,o6.settle_amt as palt_amt,o1.settle_amt as seller_amt,c.nick_name from tb_order od left join tb_order_settle o6 on od.order_id=o6.order_id and o6.fee_type=6 left join tb_order_item oi on oi.order_id=od.order_id and oi.is_shipment=0 left join tb_share s on s.id=od.share_id left join tb_dict d on d.key_id=od.`status` and d.key_group='orderStatus' left join tb_consumer c on c.id=od.consumer left join tb_hrpay_account ha on ha.source_id=s.consumer_id and ha.type='consumer' left join tb_order_settle o1 on od.order_id=o1.order_id and o1.fee_type=1 and ha.id=o1.settle_user where o6.`status` in (1,2,3) and s.consumer_id=#{consumer_id} order by od.order_id desc

select sum(case when o.status in(3,4,5) then o.total else 0 end ) waitBalance, sum(case when o.status in(6) then o.total else 0 end ) signBalance, sum(ct.waitActiveBalance) waitActiveBalance, sum(ct.hasActivebalance) hasActivebalance, sum(ct.waitBusiBalance) waitBusiBalance, sum(ct.hasBusibalance) hasBusibalance from tb_order o left join ( select os.order_id, sum(case when os.status=1 and os.fee_type=1 then os.settle_amt else 0 end ) waitActiveBalance, sum(case when os.status=2 and os.fee_type=1 then os.settle_amt else 0 end ) hasActivebalance, sum(case when os.status=1 and os.fee_type=6 then os.settle_amt else 0 end ) waitBusiBalance, sum(case when os.status=2 and os.fee_type=6 then os.settle_amt else 0 end ) hasBusibalance from tb_order_settle os group by os.order_id ) ct on o.order_id=ct.order_id where o.`status` in (3,4,5,6) and o.is_del=0 and o.order_type=2 and o.seller_id=#{corp_id}
